name: Dribbble
description: Dribbble is a self-promotion and social networking platform for digital designers and creatives.

name: Twitter
description: Twitter is an American microblogging and social networking service on which users post and interact with messages known as "tweets".

name: Tinder
description: Tinder is an American geosocial networking and online dating application that allows users to anonymously swipe to like or dislike other users' posted profiles.

name: Linkedin
description: LinkedIn is an American business and employment-oriented online service that operates via websites and mobile apps.

name: Google+
description: Google+ was a social network owned and operated by Google.
